data.event: Founded in 1853 by Benjamin Bannister the community was originally known as Appletree Cove, By 1880 it was a lumber town until the mill closed down in the early 20th century.

event.title: was originally known as Appletree Cove, By 1880

data.event: Founded in 1853 by Benjamin Bannister the community was originally known as Appletree Cove, By 1880 it was a lumber town until the mill closed down in the early 20th century.
But the local lumber yard is still in business today, owned by Tom Waggoner.
